name: Weather Lord: Hidden Realm
description: Command powerful forces of nature to free an island of an evil scourge! With the elements in your hands, a sword at your side and a little magic in your pocket, no one will be able to stop you on your march to victory!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: 1.5 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB 3D graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0c
